name: Hladgunnr
description: Hladgunnr, the elegant and dignified Valkyrie of the Swan, always appears to mortals in a robe of white feathers. Her kiss can bring eternal rest or rouse the final courage of the dying.

skills.name: Luminous Feather Lunge
skills.description: Hladgunnr dashes backward, then charges forward, dealing DMG equal to 270% of her ATK to the target and knocking them back.

upgrades.level3: Also grants herself a shield equal to 300% of her ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

skills.name: Sacred Meditation
skills.description: Hladgunnr enters the [Slumber] state upon entering battle. She is disabled but restores HP equal to 100% of ATK per sec for 10s. Casting her Ultimate cancels the [Slumber] state, grants her a shield equal to 500% of ATK, and makes her immune to Crowd Control for the skill's duration. After that, her Normal Attacks deal DMG equal to 200% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Gains 40% DMG RED while in the [Slumber] state.
upgrades.level3: This effect triggers one extra time when Hladgunnr is about to fall.
upgrades.level4: Gains 60% DMG RED while in the [Slumber] state.

skills.name: Luminous Aegis
skills.description: Hladgunnr's every Ultimate grants 20% ATK. Max at 4 stacks.

upgrades.level2: Hladgunnr gains 20% DMG RED for the first release.
upgrades.level3: Gains 25% DMG RED for the first release.
upgrades.level4: Gains 30% DMG RED for the first release.

skills.name: Domain of Verdict
skills.description: Hladgunnr creates a halo around herself, dealing DMG equal to 400% of her ATK to nearby enemies and increasing her Lifesteal by 50% and ATK DPS by 100% for 10s.

upgrades.level3: When her Ultimate cancels Sacred Meditation, she inherits the remaining buffs from it.

relic.name: Luminous Verdict
relic.description: Luminous Aegis gains an additional upgrade effect: After Hladgunnr casts her Ultimate 3 times, 10% of the DMG dealt by Hladgunnr is converted to True DMG.

upgrades.level2: Reduces the number of casts required to upgrade Luminous Aegis by one.
upgrades.level3: 30% of the DMG dealt by Hladgunnr is converted to True DMG.
upgrades.level4: Hladgunnr gains Super Armor for 6s after each cast of her Ultimate. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
